controller

Class LocalGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.LocalGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class LocalGame
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Local controller class for the Connect Four game.
    Version:
    v1.0
    Author:
    Jan-Jaap van Raffe and Wouter Bos

    • Constructor Detail

      • LocalGame

        public LocalGame()

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Runs the Connect Four game.
        Asks after each ended game if the user wants to continue. Continues until the user doesn't want to play anymore.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • getPlayers

        private void getPlayers()
        Gets the players.

      • reset

        private void reset()
        Resets the game.
        The board is emptied and player[0] becomes the current player.

      • play

        private void play()
        Plays the Connect Four game.
        First the (still empty) board is shown. Then the game is played until it is over. Players can make a move one after the other. After each move, the changed game situation is printed.

      • printResult

        private void printResult()
        Prints the result of the last game.
